tab1.text1:
<TextStyle.Grey>This server is in early development.</> 
 <TextStyle.Grey>If you need help ask in the Discord. </> 
 <TextStyle.Grey>Donate; it helps run the server.</> 
 <TextStyle.Grey>You can expect bugs!</> 



 <TextStyle.Grey>HERE ARE THE RULES:</> 
 <TextStyle.Grey>No Racism</> 
 <TextStyle.Grey>No Griefing</> 
 <TextStyle.Grey>No blocking off Obelisks</>
